scripts.build: npm run build:iife && npm run build:esm && npm run build:minify && npm run build:ext && npm run build:editors && npm run build:compress
scripts.build:esm: sed 's/__/#/g' src/htmx.js > dist/htmx.esm.js && echo '' >> dist/htmx.esm.js && echo 'export default htmx' >> dist/htmx.esm.js
scripts.build:minify: terser --compress --mangle --source-map -o dist/htmx.min.js dist/htmx.js && terser --compress --mangle --source-map -o dist/htmx.esm.min.js dist/htmx.esm.js
scripts.build:ext: mkdir -p dist/ext && for file in src/ext/*.js; do name=$(basename "$file" .js); cp "$file" "dist/ext/$name.js" && terser --compress --mangle --source-map -o "dist/ext/$name.min.js" "dist/ext/$name.js"; done
scripts.site: npm run site:css & npm run site:serve
scripts.merge:
(echo "src/** merge=ours
dist/** merge=ours
test/** merge=ours
" > .gitattributes && git add .gitattributes && git merge master); git reset HEAD .gitattributes 2>/dev/null; rm .gitattributes 2>/dev/null
